main event: A 14-year-old boy reported seeing a bright, unidentified object over Middletown, New York in November 1965.
interesting points: The object stood still for about 2 minutes before moving vertically, then backing up and dashing straight up at a rapid speed.
The object stopped for a second, then appeared to retrace its path back to the original location before vanishing.
The object was described as being about the size of a jet aircraft and having a bright, pulsing light on the front.
The witness compared the brightness of the object to a Christmas light bulb.
